comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

pull_request.title: Bump lint-staged from 15.3.0 to 15.4.0
pull_request.body:
Bumps [lint-staged](https://github.com/lint-staged/lint-staged) from 15.3.0 to 15.4.0.
Release notes

Sourced from lint-staged's releases.

v15.4.0

Minor Changes

  • #1500 a8ec1dd Thanks @​iiroj! - Lint-staged now provides TypeScript types for the configuration and main Node.js API. You can use the JSDoc syntax in your JS configuration files:

    /**
 * @filename: lint-staged.config.js
 * @type {import('lint-staged').Configuration}
 */
export default {
  '*': 'prettier --write',
}

    It's also possible to use the .ts file extension for the configuration if your Node.js version supports it. The --experimental-strip-types flag was introduced in Node.js v22.6.0 and unflagged in v23.6.0, enabling Node.js to execute TypeScript files without additional configuration.

    export NODE_OPTIONS="--experimental-strip-types"

    npx lint-staged --config lint-staged.config.ts

Patch Changes

  • #1501 9b79364 Thanks @​iiroj! - Handle possible failures when logging user shell for debug info.
Changelog

Sourced from lint-staged's changelog.

15.4.0

Minor Changes

  • #1500 a8ec1dd Thanks @​iiroj! - Lint-staged now provides TypeScript types for the configuration and main Node.js API. You can use the JSDoc syntax in your JS configuration files:

    /**
 * @filename: lint-staged.config.js
 * @type {import('lint-staged').Configuration}
 */
export default {
  '*': 'prettier --write',
}

    It's also possible to use the .ts file extension for the configuration if your Node.js version supports it. The --experimental-strip-types flag was introduced in Node.js v22.6.0 and unflagged in v23.6.0, enabling Node.js to execute TypeScript files without additional configuration.

    export NODE_OPTIONS="--experimental-strip-types"

    npx lint-staged --config lint-staged.config.ts

Patch Changes

  • #1501 9b79364 Thanks @​iiroj! - Handle possible failures when logging user shell for debug info.
Commits
  • 7ff1e58 chore(changeset): release (#1502)
  • b881830 docs: adjust README regarding TypeScript
  • 41c9fee docs: sync changelog and README regarding TypeScript
  • 6de7529 Merge pull request #1500 from lint-staged/typescript-types
  • 012916e feat: enable loading configuration from TS files (if Node.js supports importi...
  • e95d5cd feat: add TypeScript types for the main lint-staged Node.js API
  • a8ec1dd feat: add TypeScript types for configuration
  • 9b79364 fix: handle possible failures when logging user shell for debug info (#1501)
  • See full diff in compare view

[![Dependabot compatibility score](https://dependabot-badges.githubapp.com/badges/compatibility_score?dependency-name=lint-staged&package-manager=npm_and_yarn&previous-version=15.3.0&new-version=15.4.0)](https://docs.github.com/en/github/managing-security-vulnerabilities/about-dependabot-security-updates#about-compatibility-scores) Dependabot will resolve any conflicts with this PR as long as you don't alter it yourself. You can also trigger a rebase manually by commenting `@dependabot rebase`. [//]: # (dependabot-automerge-start) [//]: # (dependabot-automerge-end) ---
Dependabot commands and options
You can trigger Dependabot actions by commenting on this PR: - `@dependabot rebase` will rebase this PR - `@dependabot recreate` will recreate this PR, overwriting any edits that have been made to it - `@dependabot merge` will merge this PR after your CI passes on it - `@dependabot squash and merge` will squash and merge this PR after your CI passes on it - `@dependabot cancel merge` will cancel a previously requested merge and block automerging - `@dependabot reopen` will reopen this PR if it is closed - `@dependabot close` will close this PR and stop Dependabot recreating it. You can achieve the same result by closing it manually - `@dependabot show ignore conditions` will show all of the ignore conditions of the specified dependency - `@dependabot ignore this major version` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this major version (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself) - `@dependabot ignore this minor version` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this minor version (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself) - `@dependabot ignore this dependency` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this dependency (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself)

issue.title: loawa.com

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
# 죄송합니다. 해당 웹 사이트는 애드쉴드(AdShield, Inc)에 의해 감염되었습니다.

안타깝게도 이 웹 사이트는 안티 애드블록 전문 회사인 애드쉴드의 서비스에 의해 보호받고 있어 일반적인 애드블록 규칙로는 처리가 까다롭습니다.
애드쉴드는 대한민국 정부의 기술 창업 지원 프로그램으로부터 최대 2년에 7억원을 받습니다.

이러한 기록은 [여기](https://github.com/List-KR/List-KR/issues?q=label%3Aad-shield+)에서 검증하실 수 있습니다.
대한민국 정부의 지원 사실은 [여기](https://www.venturesquare.net/857777)에서 확인하실 수 있습니다.

## 유저스크립트 설치
[microShield 유저스크립트](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield)를 설치하여 애드쉴드 광고를 차단하시길 바랍니다.
한국어로 작성되어 있는 설치 가이드라인은 [이 URL](https://community.list-kr.com/docs/AdGuard/Userscripts/microShield)를 방문하여 확인해주세요.


## 그래도 문제가 있으신가요?
유저스크립트를 사용했을 때 발생하는 문제는 [이 이슈 트래커](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield/issues)로 알려주세요.
기타 문제는 [이 곳](https://github.com/List-KR/List-KR/issues)으로 알려주세요.
GitHub 이슈를 사용하시기 어렵다면, filters@adguard.com 로 문의해주세요.

issue.title: loawa.com

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
# 죄송합니다. 해당 웹 사이트는 애드쉴드(AdShield, Inc)에 의해 감염되었습니다.

안타깝게도 이 웹 사이트는 안티 애드블록 전문 회사인 애드쉴드의 서비스에 의해 보호받고 있어 일반적인 애드블록 규칙로는 처리가 까다롭습니다.
애드쉴드는 대한민국 정부의 기술 창업 지원 프로그램으로부터 최대 2년에 7억원을 받습니다.

이러한 기록은 [여기](https://github.com/List-KR/List-KR/issues?q=label%3Aad-shield+)에서 검증하실 수 있습니다.
대한민국 정부의 지원 사실은 [여기](https://www.venturesquare.net/857777)에서 확인하실 수 있습니다.

## 유저스크립트 설치
[microShield 유저스크립트](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield)를 설치하여 애드쉴드 광고를 차단하시길 바랍니다.
한국어로 작성되어 있는 설치 가이드라인은 [이 URL](https://community.list-kr.com/docs/AdGuard/Userscripts/microShield)를 방문하여 확인해주세요.


## 그래도 문제가 있으신가요?
유저스크립트를 사용했을 때 발생하는 문제는 [이 이슈 트래커](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield/issues)로 알려주세요.
기타 문제는 [이 곳](https://github.com/List-KR/List-KR/issues)으로 알려주세요.
GitHub 이슈를 사용하시기 어렵다면, filters@adguard.com 로 문의해주세요.

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://m.vk.com/feed](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fm.vk.com%2Ffeed) ### Comment > Обращалась в поддержку по поводу рекламы в приложении ВК, мне ответили, что в приложении нет возможности скрыть рекламу, можно пользоваться ВК через браузер, там не будет рекламы. Зашла ВК через браузер и что?-как была реклама ,так и осталась. Реклама не только в приложении ВК,но и в других приложениях смартфона. Во всех браузерах реклама выскакивает, на любой странице. За что я оплатила пожизненную лицензию?-не понимаю . В чем проблема? Username: `@Татьяна ` ### Screenshots

comment.body:
`Пульс` не является рекламой. Для его блокировки можно добавить ниже правило в пользовательские или составить свое.
```adblock
||pulse.mail.ru^$domain=~pulse.mail.ru
```

issue.title: AdGuard URL Tracking filter list disabled search suggestions on Bing
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [x] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [x] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [x] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [x] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [x] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

uBlock Origin 1.62.0 with AdGuard URL Tracking filter 2.0.10.17

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Microsoft Edge

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://www.bing.com/search?q=

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter

### Privacy

AdGuard URL Tracking filter

### Social Widgets

_No response_

### Annoyances

_No response_

### Security

_No response_

### Other

_No response_

### DNS filters

_No response_

### Language-specific

_No response_

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

uBlock Origin 1.62.0 with AdGuard URL Tracking filter 2.0.10.17
Microsoft Edge Version 131.0.2903.146 (Official build) (64-bit)
Windows 11 24H2 26100.2605

Bing search suggestions don't show with AdGuard URL Tracking filter enabled in uBlock Origin.

Filter disabled: 

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/81caa396-5f1d-42eb-8ffb-ca2a7bb067f5)

Filter enabled:

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/68910b44-4d40-485b-9262-465f76444fb6)

As you can see, the search suggestions don't show with the filter enabled, even though the text input box is focused and I'm actively typing.

### Privacy

- [x] I agree to follow this condition

Bing search suggestions don't show with AdGuard URL Tracking filter enabled in uBlock Origin.

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/81caa396-5f1d-42eb-8ffb-ca2a7bb067f5)

comment.body: Fixed. By default, without content type modifiers, we apply `removeparam` rules only to the page's document, not to loaded requests. uBO applies to all requests. It is more aggressive and may cause more problems.

comment.body:
Yes, I am using MacOS Sequoia with Safari and the Extension from the App Store. In safari browser and PWA(safari) whenever I click in the page after every action taken(navigate to a page for example) it opens a new window(popup ad). 

Is there a certain filter I must enable for this? 
Is it possible to write a custom rule to not allow popups from a website? 

Thank you for the help! Loving and recommending AdGuard to everyone!

I see ads without AdGuard. In Safari ads are blocked fine.

Do not close AdGuard window ~60 seconds, because iOS will break configuration process.

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 10 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

AdGuard for Windows ### AdGuard version 7.19.0 (4853) ### What type of problem have you encountered? Missed ads or ad leftovers ### Which browser(s) do you use? Firefox ### Which device do you use? Desktop ### Where is the problem encountered? https://www.bild.de/ ### Ad Blocking AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter ### Privacy AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, Legitimate URL Shortener ### Social Widgets AdGuard Social Media filter ### Annoyances AdGuard Cookie Notices filter, AdGuard Popups filter, AdGuard Mobile App Banners filter, AdGuard Other Annoyances filter, AdGuard Widgets filter ### Security Online Malicious URL Blocklist ### Other _No response_ ### DNS filters _No response_ ### Language-specific AdGuard German filter ### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled? Hide your search queries, Send Do-Not-Track signals, Self-destruction of third-party cookies, Remove X-Client-Data header from HTTP requests ### Add your comment and screenshots Ad placeholder on Homepage. When deleting the div, the layout align better on layout and don't leave that big space. Working filter: `bild.de#$?#.ad-wrapper { remove: true; }` You probably can better tune the filter.

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 10 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

issue.title: Bild.de
issue.body:
### Prerequisites - [x] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml); - [x] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue; - [x] AdGuard product version is up-to-date; - [x] Browser version is up-to-date; - [x] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue. ### What product do you use? AdGuard for Windows ### AdGuard version 7.19.0 (4853) ### What type of problem have you encountered? Missed ads or ad leftovers ### Which browser(s) do you use? Firefox ### Which device do you use? Desktop ### Where is the problem encountered? https://www.bild.de/ ### Ad Blocking AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter ### Privacy AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, Legitimate URL Shortener ### Social Widgets AdGuard Social Media filter ### Annoyances AdGuard Cookie Notices filter, AdGuard Popups filter, AdGuard Mobile App Banners filter, AdGuard Other Annoyances filter, AdGuard Widgets filter ### Security Online Malicious URL Blocklist ### Other _No response_ ### DNS filters _No response_ ### Language-specific AdGuard German filter ### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled? Hide your search queries, Send Do-Not-Track signals, Self-destruction of third-party cookies, Remove X-Client-Data header from HTTP requests ### Add your comment and screenshots Ad placeholder on Homepage. When deleting the div, the layout align better on layout and don't leave that big space. Working filter: `bild.de#$?#.ad-wrapper { remove: true; }` You probably can better tune the filter.
Screenshot: ![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/ed7a1216-e589-4300-8f7d-7cf5bbbddbd1)

uBlock Origin 1.62.0 with AdGuard URL Tracking filter 2.0.10.17
Microsoft Edge Version 131.0.2903.146 (Official build) (64-bit)
Windows 11 24H2 26100.2605

Bing search suggestions don't show with AdGuard URL Tracking filter enabled in uBlock Origin.

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/81caa396-5f1d-42eb-8ffb-ca2a7bb067f5)

AdGuard for Windows ### AdGuard version 7.19.0 (4853) ### What type of problem have you encountered? Missed ads or ad leftovers ### Which browser(s) do you use? Firefox ### Which device do you use? Desktop ### Where is the problem encountered? https://www.bild.de/ ### Ad Blocking AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter ### Privacy AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, Legitimate URL Shortener ### Social Widgets AdGuard Social Media filter ### Annoyances AdGuard Cookie Notices filter, AdGuard Popups filter, AdGuard Mobile App Banners filter, AdGuard Other Annoyances filter, AdGuard Widgets filter ### Security Online Malicious URL Blocklist ### Other _No response_ ### DNS filters _No response_ ### Language-specific AdGuard German filter ### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled? comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 10 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

issue.title: Bild.de
issue.body:
### Prerequisites - [x] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml); - [x] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue; - [x] AdGuard product version is up-to-date; - [x] Browser version is up-to-date; - [x] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue. ### What product do you use? AdGuard for Windows ### AdGuard version 7.19.0 (4853) ### What type of problem have you encountered? Missed ads or ad leftovers ### Which browser(s) do you use? Firefox ### Which device do you use? Desktop ### Where is the problem encountered? https://www.bild.de/ ### Ad Blocking AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter ### Privacy AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, Legitimate URL Shortener ### Social Widgets AdGuard Social Media filter ### Annoyances AdGuard Cookie Notices filter, AdGuard Popups filter, AdGuard Mobile App Banners filter, AdGuard Other Annoyances filter, AdGuard Widgets filter ### Security Online Malicious URL Blocklist ### Other _No response_ ### DNS filters _No response_ ### Language-specific AdGuard German filter ### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled? Hide your search queries, Send Do-Not-Track signals, Self-destruction of third-party cookies, Remove X-Client-Data header from HTTP requests ### Add your comment and screenshots Ad placeholder on Homepage. When deleting the div, the layout align better on layout and don't leave that big space. Working filter: `bild.de#$?#.ad-wrapper { remove: true; }` You probably can better tune the filter.
Screenshot: ![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/ed7a1216-e589-4300-8f7d-7cf5bbbddbd1)

Desktop

### Add your comment and screenshots

uBlock Origin 1.62.0 with AdGuard URL Tracking filter 2.0.10.17
Microsoft Edge Version 131.0.2903.146 (Official build) (64-bit)
Windows 11 24H2 26100.2605

Bing search suggestions don't show with AdGuard URL Tracking filter enabled in uBlock Origin.

Filter disabled: 

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/81caa396-5f1d-42eb-8ffb-ca2a7bb067f5)

Filter enabled:

As you can see, the search suggestions don't show with the filter enabled, even though the text input box is focused and I'm actively typing.

This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 10 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

### Prerequisites - [x] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml); - [x] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue; - [x] AdGuard product version is up-to-date; - [x] Browser version is up-to-date; - [x] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue. ### What product do you use? AdGuard for Windows ### AdGuard version 7.19.0 (4853) ### What type of problem have you encountered? Missed ads or ad leftovers ### Which browser(s) do you use? Firefox ### Which device do you use? Desktop ### Where is the problem encountered? https://www.bild.de/ ### Ad Blocking AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter ### Privacy AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, Legitimate URL Shortener ### Social Widgets AdGuard Social Media filter ### Annoyances AdGuard Cookie Notices filter, AdGuard Popups filter, AdGuard Mobile App Banners filter, AdGuard Other Annoyances filter, AdGuard Widgets filter ### Security Online Malicious URL Blocklist ### Other _No response_ ### DNS filters _No response_ ### Language-specific AdGuard German filter ### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled? Hide your search queries, Send Do-Not-Track signals, Self-destruction of third-party cookies, Remove X-Client-Data header from HTTP requests ### Add your comment and screenshots Ad placeholder on Homepage. When deleting the div, the layout align better on layout and don't leave that big space. Working filter: `bild.de#$?#.ad-wrapper { remove: true; }` You probably can better tune the filter.
